name: FIFA Soccer 96
overview: The most successful football game of all time has been improved and updated for the 32X. FIFA Soccer 96 is dedicated to bring you all the action from around the globe, featuring over 3500 players from 200 teams and 12 leagues. Combined with stunning graphics, 7 camera views, 4-player mode and the usual host of options, FIFA Soccer 96 delivers the total footballing experience. This version of FIFA 96 was only released in Europe, and stands as one of two PAL-exclusive 32X titles (the other being Darxide).
